com.box.sdk

Class PagingParameters

  • Object
    • PagingParameters

  • public final class PagingParameters
extends Object
    Abstraction on how SDK is doing pagination. Can be used to start offset or marker based pagination.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long DEFAULT_LIMIT
      Default limit value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PagingParameters marker(long limit)
      Starts marker based pagination.
      static PagingParameters offset(long offset, long limit)
      Starts offset based pagination.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_LIMIT

        public static final long DEFAULT_LIMIT
        Default limit value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • marker

        public static PagingParameters marker(long limit)
        Starts marker based pagination.
        Parameters:
        limit - how many elements per request should be fetched.
        Returns:
        PagingParameters setup to start marker based pagination.

      • offset

        public static PagingParameters offset(long offset,
                                      long limit)
        Starts offset based pagination.
        Parameters:
        offset - where offset pagination should start. Offset cannot be larger than 300000.
        limit - how many elements per request should be fetched.
        Returns:
        PagingParameters setup to start offset based pagination.
